[[Elizabeth Stevens]] (granddaughter) |relationships = |actor = }}'''Mrs. Stevens Sr.''' was the mother of [[Paul Stevens]] and [[Ms. Stevens]] and the paternal grandmother of [[Elizabeth Stevens]]. ==History== Mrs. Stevens Sr. got married at an unknown time to Mr. Stevens and they had two children, [[Paul Stevens|Paul]] and an [[Ms. Stevens|unnamed daughter]]. Mrs. Stevens's relationship with her son was terrible. He didn't show him much affection, never hugged him and got him a plastic chicken you hop around him rather than a Big Wheel. She owned a [[Country House|country house]] outside of New York which her granddaughter visited with her boyfriend at the time, [[Ross Geller]]. ==Relationships== ===Husband=== Mrs. Stevens Sr. most likely had a good relationship with her husband. ===Children=== As stated above, Stevens Sr.'s relationship with her son, Paul was a terrible one. She never showed him much affection and was apparently quite neglectful of him. Nothing is known about her relationship with her daughter. ==Appearances== * "[[The One Where Paul's The Man]]" (First mentioned) * "[[The One With The Ring]]" (Mentioned only) [[Category:Friends Characters]] [[Category:Unseen Characters]] [[Category:Mothers]] [[Category:Grandmothers]] [[Category:Non-Americans]] [[Category:Females]] [[Category:Deceased Characters]] [[Category:Characters]]
